itunes:title: Succeeding in the YA (Young Adult) Market
title: Succeeding in the YA (Young Adult) Market
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with the effervescent Liara Tamani, author of two YA novels, All the Things We Never Knew and Calling My Name, about writing for the YA market, knowing what young people want to read, getting your message across without preaching, her circuitous route to a writing career after being accepted to Harvard Law School, the importance of timing, as well as barriers to entry that writers of color face in publishing.
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with the effervescent Liara Tamani, author of two YA novels, All the Things We Never Knew and Calling My Name, about writing for the YA market, knowing what young people want to read, getting your message across without preaching, her circuitous route to a writing career after being accepted to Harvard Law School, the importance of timing, as well as barriers to entry that writers of color face in publishing.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and Liara Tamani
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, Liara Tamani, YA fiction, YA market, writing, writing advice, publishing, emerging writers, writers of color
